title: Skin Scan
longDescription: I built a convolutional neural network to classify images of skinspots as benign or malignant with 92% accuracy on the testing set. I also built a Streamlit interface where users can upload images of their own skinspots to classify and see a Grad-CAM heatmap revealing the specific regions of the skinspot that lead to the model's prediction.

title: Qube Social Network
description: Social media feed with sorting algorithm
longDescription: Social media app that allows users to create and edit posts, like and make comments, follow other users, search for content, and upload a profile pic and biography. Features efficient database CRUD, infinite scroll that dynamically loads posts in the feed, mobile responsive design, and a sorting algorithm that sorts posts by their relevance (detailed in the repo's README).

title: Jetpack Joyride
longDescription: This game is the final project for my data structures & algorithms class and is based on the popular mobile game Jetpack Joyride.
